'''1.6.93''' is a version for the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on September 12, 2019. 

This is the last update to the Legacy Launcher.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-11993}} - Legacy launcher can no longer start Minecraft
